dict.acceptation: 运动；竞选运动；战役；季节性竞赛；
参加[发起]运动，参加竞选；参战，参加战役；作战；

sent.orig: The campaign consists of two main parts, there is a television commercial and a print campaign.
sent.trans: 此次告白运动包含两个主体部门：电视机告白和印刷告白。

sent.orig: Supplement Courtesy Campaign with a Finesse Campaign.
sent.trans: 把礼貌运动进一步提升为“注重修养”的运动。

sent.orig: Development campaign strategies and oversee the execution of the entire campaign.
sent.trans: 定制市场营销策略以及监控整个项目的执行。

sent.orig: His campaign campaign promises also included seeking greater indepent independence from American policies neighbors in Asia.
sent.trans: 他在竞选时还承诺寻找更大程度的从美国的政策中独立开来。

sent.orig: Despite billboards and campaign posters, the election campaign has been very low-key.
sent.trans: 虽然运用了公告排和竞选布告栏等方式，选举过程还是不十分引人注意。
